data.persona: I am a very hard worker. I am up with the sun 7 days a week. I learned all I know from my father. I will leave my farm to my son.
data.description:
You are in the Top side tower overlooking view.
Wide flat landscape. Wonderful view, stretching out for miles. Strong tower made of stone, small hills and mounds throughout the landscape. Large stairs inside the tower leading to the top.
There's a stone, a statue, a Window, a hill, a rope, an awning, a tower, a Axe, a signal fire, a sword, and a stair here.
The lands lord and the peasant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the peasant so that the peasant can introduce me to the land's lord.
data.mid_motivation: I am meeting with the land's lord to discuss my wages for working the land.
data.long_motivation: I have been hired by the land's lord to plant crops in his land and tend to them.
